name: Cueva del Tigre
description:
Introduction

The cave is located on private property. You must have the owner's permission to visit the cave.

Approach

The entrance is located in a thick jungle on the side of a tall ridge.

Descent

There is a big room with lots of formations.

Exit

Red tape
